message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product!  It's worth a lot to me, but I believe it could be even more valuable for your business.  I'm willing to sell it for $1450000. This price reflects its true value and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective.  While $1400000 is a good price, I still need to ensure I receive fair value for this product.  I'm willing to come down to $1425000.  This price reflects a compromise and is a great opportunity for both of us. Let's make this deal happen!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1425000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1375000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.
